name: esumeq1
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cesum(s0, c0, c2), cesum(s0, c1, c2)))

stmt.origin: esumeq12d(s0, c0, c2, c1, c2, wceq(c0, c1))

|- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cesum(s0, c0, c2), cesum(s0, c1, c2)))

-| wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c2))
-| diffsw(s0, wceq(c0, c1))

-| wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c2))

-| diffsw(s0, wceq(c0, c1))

|- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cesum(s0, c0, c2), cesum(s0, c1, c2)))
-| diffsw(s0, wceq(c0, c1))

body.origin:
|- diffsw(s0, wceq(c0, c1))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

comment: Equality theorem for an extended sum. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 18-Feb-2017.)
